wikitext.*:
'''Ivies''' were a type of plant. They grew on trees in [[Mirkwood]]<ref>{{Cite DTP|H 07.134}}</ref><ref>{{Cite DTP|H 08.001}}</ref> and on rock-chimneys along the [[Anduin]].<ref>{{Cite DTP|LR 2.09.034}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1984-1997: ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]''''' 
:'''''Poison Ivy''''' ([[Sindarin|S.]] ''Nelhaew'', [[Quenya|Q.]] ''Neldesangwa''), also called ''Rig√°na'', was a type of ivy described in the game's books, which grew in deciduous forests. Its oily leaves caused rashes. <ref>{{ICE|2026}}, p. 131</ref>
